translation.en: What's up, Grandpa? Where you going?
[gasps] Holy fuck! Who the fuck is that?
-Oh. -Hey, it's me! It's me, it's me.
-What the fuck are you doing here? -It's me.
translation.it: - Che cazzo ci fai qui? - Sono io.

translation.en: -[laughs] What? -You scared the shit out of me.
Sorry, sorry, sorry, all right? Don't freak out.
I can't stand it when you do that!
Hey, so when is your dad's birthday again?
translation.it: Allora, quand'è il compleanno di tuo padre?

translation.en: Uh, November 9th.
Cool, cool, okay. Yeah, I got a fun gift idea for him.
translation.it: Va bene. Ho in mente un bel regalo per lui.

translation.en: What? Which one?
Yeah, I'm gonna get him these, like, Omaha Steaks.
translation.it: Gli prenderò qualcosa su Omaha Steaks.

translation.en: -You know... you know about Omaha Steaks? -Oh.
Yeah. Like, they put 'em in a box... -Mmm-hmm. -...they send 'em off,
translation.it: Ti mettono le bistecche in una bella scatola, te le inviano

translation.en: and then you take 'em out of the box and throw 'em on a grill.
translation.it: e tu le togli dalla scatola e le grigli.

translation.en: I'm gonna send your dad, like, a couple dozen.
-I think he'll like it. -Cool.
-I'll just-- -Don't touch my feet.
What? Come on, you know you like that when I touch your feet.
translation.it: Cosa? Ti piace quando te li tocco.

translation.en: -Come on-- -Don't touch my feet. I just think, it'd be good. [stutters]
translation.it: - Non mi toccare i piedi. - Pensavo... andrà bene.

translation.en: I need you back. I need you to take care of me.
translation.it: Voglio che torni, che ti prenda cura di me.

translation.en: And... and I was thinking about us...
[stammers] and... about my heart and how I feel about you.
translation.it: al mio cuore e a ciò che provo per te.

translation.en: Come on, I know you. And I love you and you're so hot.
translation.it: Ti conosco. Ti amo e sei così sexy.

translation.en: And I just... I need you, Mama.
Fine. Just shut the fuck up! I'll fuck you, but then you have to go.
translation.it: Va bene, però zitto, cazzo. Ti scopo, ma poi te ne vai.

translation.en: -You're not sleeping here tonight. -Yeah, that's cool.
translation.it: - Non dormirai qui stanotte. - Va bene.

translation.en: I was looking at this website... -Mmm-hmm. -...and I found this rug.
translation.it: Stavo guardando un sito e ho trovato questo tappeto.

translation.en: I thought it would look really good in your living room.
translation.it: Starebbe molto bene nel tuo soggiorno.

translation.en: Yeah, I like that orange one. It's nice.
translation.it: Sì, mi piace quello arancione. È carino.

translation.en: I was thinking the blue one.
Sure. Blue works, too.
translation.it: Certo. Anche il blu è carino.

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, either/or...
Orange or blue, whatever one you're standing on,
translation.it: Sia l'arancione che il blu se ci stai tu sopra

translation.en: it's gonna look good.
I was thinking about that, um... you know the blue rug.
Maybe we don't get it, like, for my place, but...
translation.it: Magari non lo prendiamo per casa mia, ma...

translation.en: Like, what if we got it for, like, our place?
translation.it: Potremmo prenderlo per casa nostra, no?

translation.en: You wanna move in together?
-I mean, do you? Do you-- -Yeah.
-You wanna move in? -Yeah.
-[moans] -Let's move in together.
-Yes! -I am God's warrior!
translation.it: - Sì! - Sono un guerriero di Dio!

translation.en: -Yes, you are! Yes, you are! -[yelling]
I'm gonna come. I'm gonna come.
I'm comin'. I'm comin'.
[Eric] Do you remember that little...
The travel-size Connect Four? Do you remember that game?
translation.it: La versione da viaggio di Forza quattro? Te lo ricordi?

translation.en: What? Why?
I just wanna... I wanna play a game from my youth, you know?
Nobody has the attention span anymore to just sit and play a game.
translation.it: Nessuno ha più la concentrazione per giocarci.

translation.en: What about Operation? Remember Operation?
translation.it: E L'allegro chirurgo? Te lo ricordi?

translation.en: [mimics electrocution] Ah, shit.
Why can't we just sit anymore?
Maybe that's 'cause you're coked up.
translation.it: Forse perché ti fai di coca.

translation.en: That's not it, all right? Okay, let's--
translation.it: Non è quello, ok? Va bene, è...

translation.en: Nobody can just sit and read a book anymore.
translation.it: Nessuno riesce più a sedersi e leggere un libro.

translation.en: Nobody just sits and reads a book-- All right, you know what? We'll...
translation.it: Nessuno. Va bene, sai che c'è?

translation.en: Let's both read books, and we'll see who gets distracted first.
translation.it: Leggiamo un libro e vediamo chi si distrae prima.

translation.en: We'll see... we'll see who's gonna do that.
I'm not gonna read with you, Eric.
translation.it: Io non leggerò con te, Eric.

translation.en: All right, this is what we'll do.
I'm gonna read Crime and Punishment, all right?
And you'll read Cujo, all right? That's what we'll do.
And we'll see who can read the most pages without getting distracted.
translation.it: Così vedremo chi legge più pagine senza distrarsi.

translation.en: Ready to do that? Let's do that, okay?
Cocaine, no cocaine, my attention will not be challenged.
translation.it: Con o senza cocaina, la mia concentrazione sarà al massimo.

translation.en: You got a real drug problem, Eric.
translation.it: Hai un problema con la droga, Eric.

translation.en: What's that?
Well, these are the drugs I have to take to deal with you.
translation.it: È la roba che devo prendere per poterti sopportare.

translation.en: All right, ready? No distractions, all right?
Just read. No distractions. No.
We just get right into it. We just get...
Just right into it. We're just gonna get right into it, all right?
-Ow! [laughs] Ow, God. -Ow! [groans]
-Fuck... ow. -Didn't know your knee was there.
translation.it: - Cazzo. - Non sapevo che c'era il tuo ginocchio.

translation.en: -Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm okay.
Hey, I love you. Okay?
What's the matter? What's wrong?
You say "I love you" too much.
-Do I? -Yeah.
Okay. Well, I'm, like, so sorry to be affectionate to you.
translation.it: Beh, scusa se provo amore per te.

translation.en: -I guess that's-- -No, it's not affection, it's pressure.
translation.it: No, non è amore, è pressione.

translation.en: Because then if I don't say it back then it becomes a thing.
translation.it: Perché poi, se non ti rispondo, diventa strano.

translation.en: Well, why wouldn't you say it back?
I mean, if it's true you would say it, right?
translation.it: Se lo provassi, lo diresti, no?

translation.en: 'Cause I, like, I love you.
Oh, my God, please stop saying that.
-Okay, well, I do. I love you-- -Okay, stop it!
translation.it: - Beh, io ti amo e... - Ok, basta!

translation.en: -I love you. -Stop it.
-What is the fucking problem? -Gus, please shut up!
I love you. God damn it! What is the matter?
translation.it: Ti amo. Porca miseria! Qual è il problema?

translation.en: -[groans] -What? Just fucking say it.
I fucked another guy! [sighs]
Well, you know, just so you know, like...
translation.it: Beh, mettiamo le cose in chiaro...

translation.en: because we're broken up, that means, like, we're not talking anymore, you know?
translation.it: Ora che ci siamo lasciati, non ci parliamo più.

translation.en: So you can, like, text, and you can call and, like, email me,
translation.it: Perciò puoi scrivermi e chiamarmi o mandarmi un'email,

translation.en: but I'm not, like, gonna reply, okay?
-So, like, once you're out, you're out. -So we're never gonna talk again?
translation.it: - Se sei fuori, sei fuori. - Perciò non parleremo più?

translation.en: No, because you fucked another guy, okay?
translation.it: No, perché ti sei scopata un altro.

translation.en: I can't imagine that... that you're just gonna be around and you're not gonna be in my life.
translation.it: Non riesco a immaginare che tu non ci sarai e non ti avrò con me.

translation.en: I mean, like...
obviously, we're still gonna be friends, okay?
-[screaming] No! -What the fuck?
This is what I'm fucking talking about!
translation.it: È ciò che cerco di dirti!

translation.en: Well, what am I?
Am I too nice? Am I too mean?
Yes, you're too fucking-- You're not nice!
You're... you're fucking fake nice, which is worse than being mean!
translation.it: Sei un finto gentile, che è peggio che essere crudeli!

translation.en: You know, it's over. I get that.
It's fucking over and it's done.
[sighs] I just want you to be true to yourself.
translation.it: Voglio che sia sincero con te stesso.

translation.en: Okay, being true to myself?
translation.it: Devo essere sincero con me stesso?

translation.en: -Yeah. -I want you to fucking die.
translation.it: - Sì. - Voglio che tu muoia, cazzo.

translation.en: Okay? I want you to fucking get a disease and die,
translation.it: Voglio che ti ammali e muoia

translation.en: or fucking get in a car accident and die.
translation.it: o che ti capiti un incidente e muoia.

translation.en: That's what I want, I want you to fucking die.
translation.it: Ecco cosa voglio, che tu muoia, cazzo.

translation.en: It's over.
-[car horn honking] -Oh, shit.
-What? What's wrong? -[sighs] We just gotta go quicker.
translation.it: - Cosa? Che c'è? - Dobbiamo fare più in fretta.

translation.en: -Why? What the fuck? -[moaning]
-My mom's here. -What the fuck?
-Why is your mom here? -Oh, just go quicker.
-Come with me, come with me. -No, I can't. I can't just do that.
translation.it: - Vieni con me. - Non posso. Non ci riesco.

translation.en: -You're like-- -[grunting]
What the fuck, dude? That's really lame.
Oh. Well, I just...
I got stuff to do today, you know? Gettin' it together.
translation.it: Ho da fare, oggi. Mi arrangio.

translation.en: You're really going right now?
What? Yeah. Yeah, she's taking me to buy pants and I totally forgot.
translation.it: Cosa? Mi porta a comprare dei pantaloni. L'avevo dimenticato.

translation.en: What the fuck?
-You can't but your own pants? -She offered.
translation.it: - Non puoi comprarteli da solo? - Si è offerta lei.

translation.en: It's not cute that you live with your parents, Eric.
translation.it: Non è bello che tu viva ancora con i tuoi, Eric.

translation.en: You tell people it's some sort of life hack, but it's just sad.
translation.it: Dici a tutti che è un espediente, ma è solo triste.

translation.en: It's sad to want new pants?
translation.it: È triste volere dei pantaloni nuovi?

translation.en: All right, I'm sorry, I'm a human being, all right?
translation.it: Va bene, scusa. Sono umano, sai?

translation.en: Eventually, I'm gonna need pants.
translation.it: Prima o poi mi servono dei pantaloni.

translation.en: [scoffs] Wait, you're going? You're actually going? Eric!
translation.it: Te ne vai? Ci vai davvero? Eric!

translation.en: I don't even know why it's something you get pissed off about.
translation.it: Non so nemmeno perché ti dà fastidio.

translation.en: -I need new pants. What's wrong with you? -Eric, fucking, you wait!
translation.it: - Mi servono. Che ti prende? - Eric, aspetta!

translation.en: Don't get in that car. You were just fucking me--
translation.it: Non salire in macchina. Mi stavi...

translation.en: [Mrs. Todd] Good morning, Mickey.
Hi, Mrs. Todd.
Hey, me and Eric are going to that new mall in Topanga.
translation.it: Io ed Eric andiamo al nuovo centro commerciale a Topanga.

translation.en: Don't get in the fucking car, dude.
translation.it: Non salire su quella cazzo di auto.

translation.en: I'm so tired of you acting like a fucking child.
translation.it: Sono stufa del tuo comportamento infantile.

translation.en: If you get in that car with your mom, then you're a fucking loser.
translation.it: Se sali in auto con tua madre, sei un cazzo di sfigato.

translation.en: Snore, snore, snore.
You're putting me to sleep, Ma. You're boring me to death right now, okay?
translation.it: Mi stai facendo addormentare. Mi annoi a morte, capito?

translation.en: You think I'm a fucking child? You think I'm a fucking loser?
translation.it: Pensi che sia un bambino? Mi credi un cazzo di sfigato?

translation.en: Well, bullshit, all right? You're just as fucked up as me.
The difference is I have the balls to admit it.
translation.it: Però io ho avuto le palle di ammetterlo.

translation.en: Ma, let's go!
Eric, honey. Honey... why don't you invite your friend Mickey
translation.it: Eric, tesoro. Perché non inviti la tua amica Mickey

translation.en: and we will go and get the slacks at the mall together?
translation.it: e andiamo a fare shopping tutti insieme?

translation.en: He's not my friend. His cum is still inside of me.
translation.it: Non è un mio amico. Ho il suo sperma ancora dentro.

translation.en: Eric, it's over!
[Eric] Who even talks to somebody's mother like that?
translation.it: Chi parla a una madre in quel modo?

translation.en: I'm open.
-Got you. -[girl chuckles]
[narrator on TV] Retaining a harem of over 100 females
translation.it: Per mantenere il suo harem di 100 femmine

translation.en: will require him to fight many challengers... [thud]
translation.it: dovrà scontrarsi con molti altri maschi più volte al giorno.

translation.en: [boy] Hey, um... a little help?
[narrator on TV] Elephant seal pups in such a hostile environment
translation.it: I cuccioli di elefante marino in un ambiente ostile

translation.en: can sometimes get caught in the middle of these riots,
translation.it: a volte possono finire in quegli scontri,

translation.en: putting them in harm's way.
-Oh... Hey. -[boy] Hey, sorry about that, man.
[Gus] Oh, sorry?
Who cares, guys? It's fine.
translation.it: E di cosa, ragazzi? È tutto a posto.

translation.en: Have fun, you know?
Here you go. Oop, sorry.
Cool.
So you guys are up... [sighs] early, huh? You on spring break or...
translation.it: Vi svegliate presto, eh? Siete in vacanza o...

translation.en: -Oh, this is study abroad. -In Los Angeles, huh?
translation.it: - Facciamo un periodo di studio qui. - A Los Angeles?

translation.en: The college, they put us up at the Springwood for a semester.
translation.it: Il college ci fa alloggiare qui a Springwood per un semestre.

translation.en: Yeah, since this shithole is basically, like, one step up from a dorm room.
translation.it: Perché questo cesso è solo un gradino più su, rispetto a un dormitorio.

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna miss all the drug dealers
and child actors and the sad divorced guys.
translation.it: gli attori bambini e quei tristi divorziati.

translation.en: Well, I'll let you get back to your Fris-ing.
Well, hey, man, we're having a kickback tonight by the pool.
translation.it: Stasera organizziamo una festa in piscina.

translation.en: You should drop by.
Yeah. Yeah, maybe. We'll see, we'll see.
[Mickey] So that's the bathroom, we have to share it.
translation.it: Questo è il bagno, che è in comune.

translation.en: -[woman] Oh, okay. -My mom gave me that stupid thing.
translation.it: - Ok. - Mia madre mi ha dato quella cazzata.

translation.en: -It's nice. Uh-huh. -Um, that's the kitchen.
translation.it: È carina. Quella è la cucina.

translation.en: -Do you cook? -Uh, a little here and there.
-Baking... -Huh?
You never really hear about an Australian style of cuisine.
translation.it: Non si sente mai parlare di una vera e propria cucina australiana.

translation.en: No, there isn't any.
-[cat meows] -Hmm. [gasps] No, bad, bad.
-Aw. Who's the kitty? -Ugh, sorry about that.
Oh, God. Are you allergic to cats?
No, no, no, I love cats. What's his name?
translation.it: No, li adoro. Come si chiama?

translation.en: His name's Grandpa.
I named him that 'cause he's a reincarnation of my grandpa.
translation.it: L'ho chiamato così perché è la reincarnazione di mio nonno.

translation.en: -Cute. -So what do you think?
translation.it: - Che carino. - Allora, che ne pensi?

translation.en: Of your, uh... Oh, here?
[stutters] Yeah. It's good, I like it.
So you wanna move in?
Um... oh, really?
Yeah, I mean, you don't seem crazy
and I don't feel like meeting with a ton of people. So?
translation.it: e non ho voglia di incontrare altre mille persone. Che dici?

translation.en: Wow, okay. Great.
Great. I'll text that other girl and tell her to not to come over.
translation.it: Bene. Dico all'altra ragazza di non venire.

translation.en: You snooze, you lose.
Cool. So were you, like, living with another roommate, or...
I mean, my boyfriend kind of lived here with me.
translation.it: Il mio ragazzo viveva qui con me.

translation.en: It was sort of on and off. He'd come and go.
He'd mainly live with his parents, but... then we broke up, so whatever. [scoffs]
translation.it: Viveva con i suoi. Ma ci siamo lasciati, perciò è finita.

translation.en: Oh, um, I'm so sorry.
Don't be. I'm so glad we broke up...
translation.it: No, io sono contenta che sia finita.

translation.en: I just don't really wanna live alone, you know?
translation.it: Ma non mi piace vivere da sola.

translation.en: Well, that's perfect. We can hang out.
translation.it: Beh, è perfetto. Possiamo stare un po' insieme.

translation.en: And we will.
I just wanna really clearly establish the roommate boundaries initially.
translation.it: Ma voglio subito stabilire le regole tra coinquiline.

translation.en: That actually sounds like we've got a lot in common.
translation.it: Sembra che abbiamo molto in comune.

translation.en: get out of my space! [chuckles]
This is gonna be fun.
But, Mother, why is the wolf following me?
translation.it: Ma, Madre, perché il lupo mi sta seguendo?

translation.en: Do not fear him. He is your protector.
Now that you're becoming a woman, your powers are growing.
translation.it: Ora che stai diventando donna, i tuoi poteri sono più forti.

translation.en: My powers? Am I becoming a witch?
translation.it: I miei poteri? Sto diventando una strega?

translation.en: We will know soon enough.
When your body aligns with the lunar cycle.
translation.it: Quando il tuo corpo si allineerà con le fasi lunari.

translation.en: Now, command the wolf.
translation.it: E ora da' l'ordine al lupo.

translation.en: -[inhales sharply] -Sabien, submit.
He's not even looking at me.
Uh, cut!
All right, let's get the wolf to sit. How about that? What's the problem?
translation.it: Fate sedere il lupo. Qual è il problema?

translation.en: Arya, you have to make your hand a fist or the wolf won't sit.
translation.it: Arya, devi fare il pugno con la mano, se no il lupo non si siede.

translation.en: I was.
No, actually, you were just holding your hand up.
translation.it: No, hai solo alzato la mano.

translation.en: Are you blind or something?
I was doing exactly what you said to. The dog's just stupid.
translation.it: Ho fatto ciò che mi hai detto. È quel cane che è stupido.

translation.en: God, just check the playback, I was doing it.
translation.it: Controlla il video. Lo stavo facendo.

translation.en: Arya, superstar, what up?
[groaning] I'm so tired!
-Evan. -Hey, what's up, man?
Hey, man. What's going on?
Not much. What do you need?
-Tutor time. -Seriously? You're doing this now?
translation.it: - È l'ora della lezione. - Davvero? Adesso?

translation.en: Dude, have you been paying attention? We lose the wolf in half an hour.
translation.it: Hai fatto attenzione? Tra mezz'ora non avremo più il lupo.

translation.en: No, I get it. I just... you know...
Arya needs her three hours of class...
translation.it: Arya deve fare tre ore di lezione al giorno.

translation.en: -every day. -Right.
I'm dealing with a child actor and a live animal here.
translation.it: Qui ho un attore bambino e un animale.

translation.en: I-- I just need you to be a team player.
translation.it: Mi serve che giochi di squadra.

translation.en: I know. But I feel like it's always
translation.it: Lo so. Ma mi sembra che ci sia sempre un animale

translation.en: animals that are coming in and push, you know...
translation.it: Lo so. Ma mi sembra che ci sia sempre un animale che impedisce... Un giorno i serpenti, poi il...

translation.en: One day it's snakes, the next day it's--
translation.it: che impedisce... Un giorno i serpenti, poi il...

translation.en: Dude, have you ever worked on a supernatural period piece before?
translation.it: Hai mai lavorato in una serie sul sovrannaturale?

translation.en: Come on, man. Everyday there's a serpent or there's a mule.
translation.it: Andiamo. Ogni giorno c'è un serpente o un mulo.

translation.en: I'm looking out for Arya here, okay?
translation.it: Io devo pensare ad Arya, ok?

translation.en: I don't know what to tell you, man. They're witches, they deal with animals.
translation.it: Non so cosa dirti. Sono streghe, hanno a che fare con animali.

translation.en: Evan, she needs three hours of class every day, okay?
translation.it: Evan, deve fare tre ore di lezione al giorno.

translation.en: So we're doing this.
Seriously? That's the tone you're gonna take?
Yeah, come on, man. It's the law.
-It's called working-- -What's going on?
-Is there an issue? -Susan, hey.
Uh, no issues.
Lovin' the scene, it's so good.
Guys, this wolf is almost out the door.
-Can we handle this some other time? -[Evan] Yes.
Right, but it's just--
If Arya's not in class
and somebody reports this, we could lose our jobs and--
translation.it: e la cosa si scopre, rischiamo...

translation.en: [scoffs] Dude, you are the only one that cares about--
But we could. We could lose our jobs!
Hey, hey, hey. Why are we going crazy here?
translation.it: Ehi. Perché stiamo dando di matto?

translation.en: Gus, listen.
I respect your passion and commitment here.
translation.it: Ammiro la tua passione e il tuo impegno.

translation.en: -Thank you. Thank you. -[Susan] You know?
Yeah, and, you know, and if the wolf goes away before we get this shot, you know, that's... that's fine.
translation.it: se il lupo se ne va prima di finire la scena, va bene.

translation.en: You know, we'll... we'll work it out.
That means so much. I appreciate that. Thank you.
translation.it: Vuole dire molto per me. Grazie, davvero.

translation.en: What would that mean, Evan?
I'm guessing we just have to come in on Saturday to finish?
Yeah, just come in over the weekend.
-Yep. Mmm-hmm. -Mmm.
The crew will probably not like that much.
[Evan] Oh, they're gonna be pissed.
I mean, I guess you don't give a fuck about
translation.it: Ma te ne sbatti le palle

translation.en: people spending time with their kids. Oh, wait, you don't have kids.
translation.it: di chi vuol stare con i figli. Tu non ne hai.

translation.en: -[Evan] That's for sure. -Uh...
I feel like we're wasting time by arguing about it, so...
translation.it: Stiamo perdendo tempo a parlarne, perciò...

translation.en: [inhales] Let's just do it.
-Really? Excellent. -[Gus] We'll do it. Mmm-hmm.
You're my soldier.
All right, we got another take, everybody. Second take.
translation.it: Facciamo un altro ciak. Secondo ciak.

translation.en: Uh, why does everyone else get a CGI wolf? Why the fuck do we have a real wolf here?
translation.it: Perché gli altri hanno i lupi in digitale? Perché noi abbiamo un lupo vero?

translation.en: Arya, hey. False alarm.
It's gonna be about 50 more minutes. And then, we'll take it to class.
translation.it: Avrai altri 50 minuti. E poi faremo lezione.

translation.en: I can't. I need a nap.
translation.it: Non posso. Devo riposare un po'.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Nope. No naps today.
-I've been here since 6:00. -I know that.
But how you gonna count all that money you got if, uh, you don't know math, right?
translation.it: Ma se non fai matematica, come conterai tutti i soldi che fai?

translation.en: Um, Jeff, the accountant?
Right, Jeff.
He's an Orthodox Jew, I think he knows what he's doing.
translation.it: È un ebreo ortodosso. Sa quel che fa.

translation.en: [man on radio] Our next caller is Jason from Chicago.
translation.it: Il prossimo in linea è Jason da Chicago.

translation.en: Jason, how we doin'? How's our day going?
translation.it: Jason, come andiamo? Come va, oggi?

translation.en: [Jason] Well, my mom passed away.
Oh. My condolences.
I have to say, I'm not too torn up about it,
translation.it: - Mi dispiace. - Devo dire che non sono troppo distrutto

translation.en: and actually, that's what's kind of got me upset.
translation.it: ed è proprio questo che mi distrugge.

translation.en: The fact that I'm not upset.
translation.it: Il fatto che non sia distrutto.

translation.en: We can't control how we feel.
translation.it: Non possiamo controllare ciò che proviamo.

translation.en: And sometimes... [inhales]
these archetypical people in our lives, they hurt us.
translation.it: ...queste figure archetipiche nella nostra vita ci feriscono.

translation.en: And they don't fulfill the archetype.
What... what's an archetype?
An archetype is a...
Well, I don't really have the exact definition.
I do know what it means, obviously, because I just used it. Um...
translation.it: Ovviamente so cosa vuol dire, dato che l'ho detto. CHIUDI

translation.en: Well, thank you so much for calling.
I am Dr. Greg Coulter
and you are listening to the Love and Living Channel
translation.it: e state ascoltando il canale della vita e dell'amore

translation.en: on Gravity Satellite Radio.
You listen, we hear.
Great. Great show, Greg.
[Dr. Greg] Oh, thanks so much, Rob.
-I really appreciate it. -So good.
-Good morning, Mickey. -Hey, you said you wanted to talk?
We need to fire Rob. Rob's gotta go. Does that make me evil?
translation.it: Dobbiamo licenziare Rob. Sono una persona orribile?

translation.en: No! Please. This is a business.
translation.it: No! Per favore. Gli affari sono affari.

translation.en: You know what?
Can you fire him for me... huh?
-Or do program managers not do that? -[sighs]
translation.it: Non lo fanno i responsabili del programma?

translation.en: What? I mean, okay, you know what? I'll do it.
translation.it: Cosa? Ok, va bene, lo farò io.

translation.en: If you do it, Rob will think I'm a coward.
translation.it: Se no Robert mi prenderà per codardo.

translation.en: Yeah, I think that's probably the right move.
translation.it: Credo che sia la cosa giusta.

translation.en: No, wait, you know what? You do it.
I'm sorry, I'll stop being annoying.
translation.it: Scusa. La smetto di essere seccante.

translation.en: So what's the problem? What did he do?
translation.it: Ma qual è il problema? Cosa ha fatto?

translation.en: Look... Rob does a great job...
translation.it: Vedi... Rob fa un lavoro egregio...

translation.en: but the guy creeps me out.
He's got this look in his eyes. You ever meet a person
translation.it: Ha uno sguardo strano. Conosci qualcuno

translation.en: and they smile, and you feel like they're screaming at you?
translation.it: che sorride ma sembra che ti urli contro?

translation.en: What? Rob?
Rob's like the nicest guy in the whole world.
translation.it: Rob è la persona più gentile del mondo.

translation.en: He's nicer than both of us.
translation.it: È più gentile di noi due.

translation.en: Well, he's just got this bad energy, this aura around him.
translation.it: Ha un'energia negativa, un'aura che non mi piace.

translation.en: Has he ever done anything to you?
He asked me do I like him.
translation.it: Mi ha chiesto se mi sta simpatico.

translation.en: That's weird, right? That's not a thing you ask anybody.
translation.it: È strano, no? Non è una cosa che si chiede.

translation.en: -Let alone in a workplace. -[sighs]
Look... I would fire him but I can't take that on right now.
translation.it: Lo licenzierei io, ma ora non posso farcela.

translation.en: This might be a difficult thing for you to understand
translation.it: Potrebbe essere difficile per te da capire,

translation.en: but I am very vulnerable in this job.
translation.it: ma sono molto vulnerabile in questo lavoro.

translation.en: I have to be.
I make myself vulnerable to the world.
translation.it: Mi rendo vulnerabile verso il mondo.

translation.en: I can't be vulnerable around somebody like Rob.
translation.it: Non posso esserlo con accanto uno come Rob.

translation.en: So he's gotta go.
Fine, I'll do it just to end this conversation.
translation.it: Va bene, lo farò, almeno chiudiamo questa conversazione.

translation.en: I'm a pussy, aren't I?
I'm sorry, I'm disgusting.
Okay, you know what? I'll do it.
translation.it: Ok, sai che c'è? Lo farò io.

translation.en: -[whispers] Thank you. -Oh, question.
What is a good band to work out to? Something new.
translation.it: Mi consigli una nuova band da ascoltare mentre mi alleno?

translation.en: [exhales] I don't know. The Monkees?
That's great. [chuckles]
Thanks, you're the best. You know what?
translation.it: Grazie, sei la migliore. Sai che ti dico?

translation.en: You fire Rob.
[woman] So how was the move out of the Springwood?
Uh, you know, it's funny it didn't end up actually happening.
translation.it: È strano, ma alla fine non me ne sono andato.

translation.en: He finally realizes that the Springwood rules.
translation.it: Ha capito che Springwood è il massimo.

translation.en: You love it there, right?
No. I mean... not exactly.
You can live anywhere in LA!
translation.it: Puoi vivere ovunque a Los Angeles!

translation.en: Okay, like, where?
I mean... [stutters] I've been looking, but it's just...
I'm having a hard time finding a place I like.
translation.it: ...faccio fatica a trovare un posto che mi piaccia.

translation.en: You can move near me. The Eastside.
translation.it: Puoi trasferirti vicino a me. Nell'Eastside.

translation.en: I don't know. It's just a little too cool. And now...
translation.it: Non lo so. È un po' troppo figo. E di tendenza.

translation.en: I'd be like the Beverly Hills guy with, like, a white Corvette.
translation.it: Io sarei il tipico tizio di Beverly Hills con la Corvette bianca.

translation.en: [clears throat] I mean, is that what we're doing?
[stammers] We're just playing what we'd wanna be?
I don't think it's, like, what I want to be. It's, like, who I am.
translation.it: Il problema non è chi voglio essere, ma chi sono.

translation.en: Like, who am I?
I mean, like, where do guys like me live, you know?
translation.it: Dove vivono i tipi come me?

translation.en: Where do the, like, repressed hostile nerds
translation.it: Dove vivono quei nerd repressi e ostili

translation.en: whose girlfriend's accuse them of being "fake nice" live?
translation.it: accusati dalle proprie ragazze di essere "falsi gentili"?

translation.en: -Santa Monica? -No.
As long as I stay in the Springwood, you know...
maybe I get a text from Natalie saying, "Let's try it again."
translation.it: Natalie potrebbe scrivermi chiedendomi di riprovarci.

translation.en: And I can just bop out of the Springwood back to another place
translation.it: E potrei andarmene da Springwood da qualche altra parte,

translation.en: instead of like, bop Springwood, bop new place, bop Natalie.
translation.it: invece che lasciare Springwood, andare in un nuovo posto, poi da Natalie.

translation.en: It's crazy, right?
Please don't tell me you think you and Natalie are gonna get back together.
translation.it: Non dirmi che pensi che tu e Natalie tornerete insieme.

translation.en: -'Cause that's never gonna happen. -Yeah.
You're saying it... like, it's over?
She cheated on you. Why would you wanna be with her?
translation.it: Ti ha tradito. Perché vuoi stare con lei?

translation.en: Gus, she sucked, man.
[woman] Fuck Natalie. And fuck the Springwood.
I think you'll find someone better.
[stammers] You know, I know you'll find someone better
translation.it: Sono certa che troverai di meglio

translation.en: and if you have trouble, I can set you up.
translation.it: e, se non ci riesci, ti troverò qualcuno io.

translation.en: She wasn't right for you, dude.
I think I gotta go.
Gus. Wait. We gotta...
[sighs] We gotta pay.
Otis, put the dirt down now!
I suppose it's better than Heather's kid. -She eats dog shit. -[snorts]
translation.it: Sempre meglio del figlio di Heather. Mangia merda di cane.

translation.en: [laughs] I'm serious.
Oh, my God, this day is dragging.
translation.it: Oddio, questa giornata non finisce più.

translation.en: You know what my favorite part of the day is?
translation.it: Sai qual è la parte della giornata che preferisco?

translation.en: [sighs] Taking my Ambien.
-Really? -Yeah.
There's this moment right after it kicks in,
translation.it: Il momento in cui inizia a fare effetto,

translation.en: and I'm still awake and everything is perfect.
translation.it: sono ancora sveglia e tutto è perfetto.

translation.en: Seriously, I look forward to 9:30 every day.
translation.it: Davvero, aspetto ogni giorno le 21:30 con ansia.

translation.en: I don't like that shit.
I always wake up having made spaghetti.
translation.it: Mi sveglio sempre che ho fatto gli spaghetti.

translation.en: [chuckling] Spaghetti is the best. What's wrong with that?
translation.it: Gli spaghetti sono buonissimi. Che c'è di male?

translation.en: You want some Ambien?
No, thanks. [sighs]
Are you sober?
Kinda.
I get it.
Fuck it! Give me some Ambien. Give me a whole handful.
translation.it: Cazzo! Dammi un po' di Ambien. Dammene un bel po'.

translation.en: [inhales sharply] All right.
I'm sure you have your own methods... but I turn off all electronic devices.
translation.it: Tu avrai i tuoi metodi, ma io spengo tutti gli apparecchi elettronici.

translation.en: The last time I took an Ambien, I emailed my high school principal
translation.it: L'ultima volta che l'ho preso ho scritto al mio preside del liceo

translation.en: to tell him what a great job he had done.
translation.it: per dirgli quanto era stato bravo.

translation.en: [chuckles softly] That's why you're my favorite neighbor.
translation.it: Per questo sei la mia vicina preferita.

translation.en: Otis, enough with the dirt.
You have reached your quota.
translation.it: Per oggi hai raggiunto il limite.

translation.en: Down.
You know, I guess she used to be an extra on The Little Rascals.
translation.it: Credo facesse la comparsa ne Le simpatiche canaglie.

translation.en: For real?
-Yeah, no, she told me that. -[man] Jeez.
translation.it: - Sì, me l'ha detto lei. - Cavolo.

translation.en: -Hey, what's going on? -Hey.
What's happening here?
This old lady in E-2021 died.
I guess she fell in the shower
translation.it: A quanto so, è caduta nella doccia

translation.en: and the water kept running on her body for, like, a week,
translation.it: e l'acqua ha continuato a scendere per una settimana

translation.en: so when they found her, the bathtub was full of mush.
translation.it: perciò, quando l'hanno trovata, la vasca era piena di poltiglia.

translation.en: Jesus! [softly] What... What?
I told you not to give details.
translation.it: Ti ho detto di non rivelare i dettagli.

translation.en: Yeah, well, you're the one who gave me the details.
translation.it: Beh, sei tu che li hai detti a me.

translation.en: She lived here for 42 years, man.
How long have you guys lived here? Eighteen years.
translation.it: - Voi da quanto vivete qui? - Diciotto anni.

translation.en: They're roommates but they're not gay.
Yeah, Chris, I don't care. That's fine.
Why, did you think we were gay?
We're best friends. This is my BFF. We're roomies.
translation.it: Siamo grandi amici. Lui è il mio migliore amico.

translation.en: Yeah, no, he said... I didn't.
translation.it: No, l'ha detto lui, non io.

translation.en: I don't even care. It's fine.
translation.it: A me non importa. Va benissimo.

translation.en: Nice to meet you.
-Yep. -Take it easy.
Later, dudes.
Hey, we're not gonna wind up like those two guys, are we?
translation.it: Non finiremo come quei due, vero?

translation.en: I hope so.
We should be so fucking lucky.
Thirty years of friendship?
We should be so fucking lucky, Gus.
Fuck it.
[sighs heavily] Shit.
translation.it: Scusa. Perdonami. Parliamo. Cazzo. Stasera, Casa della Beatitudine? 3294 Wilton. Mi manchi.

translation.en: You know what I love about Uber?
translation.it: Sai cosa mi piace di Uber?

translation.en: You don't have to tip.
translation.it: Che non devi dare la mancia.

translation.en: Fuck taxis, man. Uber's changing the world.
translation.it: 'Fanculo i taxi. Uber sta cambiando il mondo.

translation.en: And you own this car, right?
translation.it: E la macchina è tua, no?

translation.en: It's, like, a nice car.
-Yes, ma'am. -[cell phone chimes]
[softly] Oh, shit! Oh, fuck! Shit!
translation.it: Hai parlato con Rob? Cazzo! Porca troia!

translation.en: [Rob on phone] Hello, this is Rob.
Hi, this is Mickey Dobbs, the program manager from work.
translation.it: Ciao, sono Mickey Dobbs, la direttrice dei programmi.

translation.en: Uh, anyway, you know that. [chuckles]
Um, I didn't...
Uh, I don't wanna do this over voicemail, but, um...
translation.it: Non vorrei farlo con un messaggio in segreteria, ma...

translation.en: Hello?
Hello? Is this...
is this one of those trick voicemail things?
Mickey, is that you?
God! Sorry! Your voice doesn't normally sound so message-y.
translation.it: Dio! Scusa! La tua voce di solito non sembra una segreteria.

translation.en: [chuckles] No, it's me.
We're gonna put Frozen on in one second, honey, I promise.
translation.it: Tra un attimo metteremo Frozen, promesso.

translation.en: Is everything okay?
Um... I don't know how to say this, uh...
I'm just gonna... I'm just gonna come right out
and say it to you, 'cause I respect you, okay, Rob?
translation.it: e diretta, perché ti rispetto, ok, Rob?

translation.en: You are fired from, you know, work.
[scoffs] What?
Greg told you to fire me?
translation.it: Greg ti ha chiesto di licenziarmi?

translation.en: But... it's nothing personal.
translation.it: Ma non c'è niente di personale.

translation.en: Sure, it's not personal.
You're just Dr. Greg's little henchman, that's all.
translation.it: Tu sei solo la scagnozza del dottor Greg.

translation.en: Oh, come on, man. Aren't we all henchmen?
"Aren't we all henchmen?" What the fuck does that mean?
translation.it: "Non siamo tutti scagnozzi?" Che cazzo significa?

translation.en: Are you high right now?
Are you on drugs?
-Drugs? -[car horns honking]
Oh, so you're firing me over the phone while you drive on drugs?
translation.it: Mi licenzi per telefono mentre sei fatta di droga?

translation.en: That's great. Why don't you show my daughter that?
Tell my six-year-old daughter that. Go ahead.
translation.it: Dillo a mia figlia di sei anni, forza.

translation.en: Hey, look, I drew a big star.
Oh, she drew a big star... [whispering] you fucking cock-whore!
translation.it: Ha disegnato una grande stella... brutta troia!

translation.en: Whoa, dude, uncalled for! Shit!
translation.it: Ehi, questo era proprio gratuito! Cazzo!

translation.en: [Eric] Mickey.
-What the fuck are you wearing? -Aw.
I'm glad you made it.
This is a really weird bar.
It's not a bar. You haven't heard of Bliss House?
translation.it: Non è un bar. Non conosci la Casa della Beatitudine?

translation.en: No. What is this, like, a...
like, a club for old people?
It's a church. Well, they say it's... like a church for all churches, you know.
translation.it: Una chiesa. Dicono sia... una chiesa per tutte le religioni.

translation.en: It's more about oneness and togetherness, not so much a higher being.
translation.it: Non tanto per un'entità superiore, quanto per sentirsi uniti.

translation.en: But I'm... I'm trying to say I'm sorry, all right?
translation.it: Ma sto cercando di scusarmi, ok?

translation.en: This is... this is how I'm trying to say I'm sorry to you.
translation.it: Questo è il mio modo per chiederti scusa.

translation.en: The midnight service is the best one.
translation.it: La messa di mezzanotte è splendida.

translation.en: -You're gonna love it. -Fuck, no.
Dude, no, no, I can't do that.
I'm wearing, like, a one-piece under jeans.
Hey! Our buddy from the balcony!
translation.it: Ehi! Il nostro amico del balcone!

translation.en: Hey, what's up? You guys! All right. There you are.
You dropped by. You even brought your work backpack.
translation.it: Sei passato. Hai portato anche il tuo zaino da lavoro.

translation.en: I'm Gus, by the way.
-I'm Nate. Good to meet you. -Hello. Hi.
-Hey, I'm Hailey. -Did you get a drink yet, man?
translation.it: - Ciao, sono Hailey. - Hai già preso da bere?

translation.en: Uh, you know what?
Yeah. Give me a beer.
-Give you a-- -[Gus] Yeah, give me a beer. Cool.
translation.it: - Una... - Sì, una birra bella fredda.

translation.en: Yeah, all right. Okay.
-Beer. [chuckles] -Thank you. Thanks.
-Cheers. -Yeah.
Good evening, blessed specimens of this lifetime.
translation.it: Buonasera, esemplari fortunati di questa vita.

translation.en: How are you all feeling? I wanna hear you.
Tonight, we stand together
in a vibratory field of an advancing potential,
translation.it: nel campo vibratorio di un potenziale di avanzamento

translation.en: the foundation of which is love.
translation.it: il cui principio di base è l'amore.

translation.en: Love doesn't just happen, we have to choose it.
We are in a phase of evolution where we have to agree with love.
translation.it: Siamo in una fase dell'evoluzione in cui dobbiamo accordarci con l'amore.

translation.en: We are in a phase of evolution where we have to embrace love.
translation.it: Siamo in una fase dell'evoluzione in cui dobbiamo accogliere l'amore.

translation.en: We have to see love, feel love, touch love, heal love.
translation.it: Dobbiamo vedere, sentire, toccare, guarire l'amore.

translation.en: From the very core of our inner sanction.
translation.it: Dal profondo della nostra approvazione interiore.

translation.en: Right? You guys know what I'm talking about.
-Come on, let me hear you. -[applause]
Holy fuck.
You guys are doing it right. Seriously.
All of you guys, this is, like, what your twenties should be about.
translation.it: Tutti voi, dovreste vivere così i vostri vent'anni.

translation.en: Having fun, going wild.
Ever since I was a little kid, I've been acting like a grown-up.
translation.it: Da quando ero piccolo, mi sono comportato da adulto.

translation.en: And now, it's like, I'm in my thirties,
translation.it: E ora che ho superato i trent'anni,

translation.en: and I'm, like...
"Oh, my God!"
I need to make up for lost time.
Hey, let's get fucking crazy tonight!
Will you shut the fuck up?
This is a family community.
Families live here. This isn't fucking Club Med!
translation.it: Qui vivono delle famiglie, non è un villaggio vacanze!

translation.en: Hey! Uh, why don't you just, uh,
let us enjoy this one special moment in our lives...
translation.it: godere questo momento speciale delle nostre vite...

translation.en: before we, you know, fucking slip in a shower and turn to mush?
translation.it: ...prima di scivolare nella doccia e diventare poltiglia?

translation.en: Go fuck yourself, man!
-I love you guys! -[cheering]
I love this place!
Guys, thank you so much.
So fun. Really--
-You're the man, Gus. -[Gus] You guys are...
-All right, we'll see you tomorrow. -See you tomorrow.
Hey, what are you doing now?
Me? Um, sawing some logs. [chuckles]
translation.it: Io? Vado a segare qualche tronco.

translation.en: What... What does... What does that mean? I don't know what that means.
translation.it: - Che vuol dire? - Io non lo so.

translation.en: It means sleeping. It's like an old expression for sleeping.
translation.it: Vuol dire dormire. È una vecchia espressione.

translation.en: We still have a couple of hours to kill. Do you wanna hang out at your place?
translation.it: Abbiamo ancora un paio d'ore. Vuoi che veniamo a casa tua?

translation.en: Yeah. Well, okay. It's a little messy, if that's cool.
translation.it: Va bene. C'è un po' di casino, spero vada bene.

translation.en: [Hailey] Oh, God, it's fine.
Oh, my God! Your bedroom is literally identical to ours.
translation.it: Oddio! La tua stanza è identica alla nostra.

translation.en: -No way. Really? [chuckles] -Yeah. It's so lame, right?
Hey, look at these candles!
-They've never even been lit. -[Hailey laughs] So lame.
translation.it: - Non sono mai state accese. - Tremendo.

translation.en: It's crazy they have all the same stuff in every...
translation.it: È assurdo che ci sia la stessa roba...

translation.en: -Yeah. -I know.
-It's nuts. -It's, uh... They're like clones.
-They're clones of each other. -[sighs] -[girl] Clones. -[chuckles]
I'm gonna miss it though.
It sucks that we have to leave and fly back.
translation.it: È un peccato dover tornare a casa.

translation.en: -[Gus] Uh... -We wanna move to LA after college.
translation.it: Vogliamo venire a Los Angeles dopo il college.

translation.en: -Ooh. -Oh, really?
-Yeah. [chuckles] -Oh, that's cool.
Yeah, 'cause we never did anything fun while we were here.
translation.it: Perché non ci siamo divertite stando qui.

translation.en: We had all these, like, wild, crazy plans.
-[laughs] -Oh, really? Like what?
You guys wanted to go to Six Flags or something, right?
No, like, um... [clicks tongue]
I don't know, uh... [sighs]
-Never mind. -[both chuckle]
-You guys are-- -We, uh...
We... we kinda...
-[chuckles] -We wanted to have a three-way.
translation.it: Volevamo fare una cosa a tre.

translation.en: -Yeah. [chuckles] Uh, have-- -Yeah.
Have you ever had one?
-Mmm. Okay. -I... I don't think I have. No.
-No, haven't had a three-way. -[all chuckles]
translation.it: No, mai fatto una cosa a tre.

translation.en: Well, um, I know Reese hasn't...
translation.it: So che Reese non l'ha fatto...

translation.en: -No? Right. [chuckles] -...and I haven't, and, uh...
translation.it: - No? Ok. - E nemmeno io e...

translation.en: -And I-- Yeah, I haven't. Yeah. no. -And... you haven't.
translation.it: - Già, neanche io. No. - Nemmeno tu.

translation.en: So, yeah.
Um, so, is... is it happening?
Now, is this it? This is the three-way? Yeah?
translation.it: Così? Facciamo una cosa a tre?

translation.en: -Yes, Gus. -Okay.
I think that was clear.
Cool.
Children, please, step inside our vibratory field of energy and love
translation.it: Ragazzi, entrate nel campo vibratorio di energia e amore

translation.en: and receive our message.
Remember, if you ask the world for love, you will receive love.
translation.it: Ricordate, se chiedete amore al mondo, riceverete amore.

translation.en: All of tonight's newcomers, please rise.
translation.it: I nuovi arrivati di stasera si alzino.

translation.en: Come on. I know-- I know you're digging this.
translation.it: Forza. So che ti sta piacendo.

translation.en: All right, fuck it. [scoffs]
We speak from our eyes and say, welcome home.
translation.it: Parliamo con gli occhi e diciamo: benvenuti a casa.

translation.en: [all] "Welcome home."
-[man] We love you. -[all] "We love you."
We walk in your hearts, and embrace your soul.
translation.it: Entriamo nei vostri cuori e nelle vostre anime.

translation.en: [all] "We walk in your hearts, and embrace your soul."
translation.it: "Entriamo nei vostri cuori e nelle vostre anime."

translation.en: Please, welcome our newcomers.
translation.it: Diamo il benvenuto ai nuovi arrivati.

translation.en: This brings our service to an end.
If you didn't get a chance to donate, the tithing baskets are up front.
translation.it: Se non l'avete fatto prima, i cestini delle offerte sono all'ingresso.

translation.en: [Mickey] Can I ask something?
Excuse me. Sorry. Excuse me.
[man] Speak what's in your heart.
Hi, guys. Sorry, I'm on Ambien, so it's, um...
translation.it: Salve, ragazzi. Sono sotto Ambien, perciò...

translation.en: You said earlier that if you ask for love, the world will send you love back.
translation.it: Prima hai detto che se si chiede amore, il mondo ti restituirà amore.

translation.en: But I've been asking and asking,
translation.it: Ma io ho chiesto e richiesto

translation.en: and I haven't gotten fucking anything.
translation.it: e non ho ricevuto un cazzo.

translation.en: Hoping and waiting and wishing and wanting love...
translation.it: Ho sperato, aspettato e desiderato l'amore...

translation.en: Hoping... hoping for love has fucking ruined my life.
translation.it: Aspettare l'amore mi ha rovinato la vita.

translation.en: And you're right, Eric. I am a fuck-up.
translation.it: Hai ragione, Eric. Sono un casino.

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
But I refuse to believe
that all those dipshits I went to high school with,
translation.it: che tutti quei coglioni con cui andavo a scuola,

translation.en: who are married now and putting pictures on Facebook every day
translation.it: che sono sposati e ogni giorno pubblicano una foto su Facebook

translation.en: of their kids in little headbands have it all figured out, right?
translation.it: dei loro figli con i cappellini abbiano capito tutto.

translation.en: That's gotta be bullshit.
That can't be the deal. That can't be it.
translation.it: Non può essere quella la realtà.

translation.en: I know it's, like, not appropriate to be standing up here in a bathing suit...
translation.it: So che non dovrei starmene qui praticamente in costume,

translation.en: but I took an Ambien tonight.
I... I was supposed to go to sleep, but then he called me to come here.
translation.it: Dovevo andare a dormire, ma lui mi ha chiesto di venire qui.

translation.en: -I'm really sorry. -Okay... okay.
-So sorry. -[whispering] It's okay. Thank you.
So many of you.
I'm sorry, I'm just having so much, uh...
Uh, hey, um, hang on...
I'm gonna put on a condom, all right?
I'm... I'm gonna put on a condom real quick, okay? [sighs]
translation.it: Metto un preservativo alla svelta, ok?

translation.en: -Excuse me. Sorry, pardon me. -Okay. [chuckles]
So, uh, you know, you two can, uh, kiss each other if you want, you know.
translation.it: Voi due potete baciarvi, se volete.

translation.en: -Nah, that's okay. -No. We don't really want to.
translation.it: - Va bene. - No. Preferiamo di no.

translation.en: -You're sure? Really? -[Reese] Yeah.
'Cause otherwise, it's not really, like, a threesome.
translation.it: Perché se no, non è proprio una cosa a tre.

translation.en: It's more like, you know, two adjacent twosomes or... [chuckles]
translation.it: Sono piuttosto due cose a due insieme o...

translation.en: -Nah. It's not our thing. -No?
Oh, I see, it's sort of, like, um, I'm like the conduit.
translation.it: Per come la vedo, io sono l'intermediario.

translation.en: We're sisters.
What the fuck? Jesus! Ew!
I mean, I'm sorry, I don't mean, "Ew," but just, like, what the fuck? Ew!
translation.it: Scusate. Non intendevo "che schifo". Ma che cazzo... Che schifo!

translation.en: Relax. What's wrong?
You know, for most guys this would be, like, a fantasy.
translation.it: Per molti ragazzi è un sogno.

translation.en: What, to be, like, a participant in incest?
translation.it: Che cosa, partecipare a un incesto?

translation.en: -This isn't incest, okay? -No.
We've never kissed. We haven't even touched each other.
translation.it: Non ci siamo mai baciate né toccate.

translation.en: Okay, yeah, but you're, like... [stutters] you know, naked in front of each other.
translation.it: Ok, ma siete... nude una di fronte all'altra.

translation.en: That's, like, in the realm of, you know, fucking incest.
translation.it: E questo si avvicina a un cazzo di incesto.

translation.en: So, was it incest when we had baths together as little girls?
translation.it: Era un incesto quando ci facevano il bagno insieme da piccole?

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. That is, like, worlds apart! Okay?
translation.it: No. Quello è del tutto diverso! Ok?

translation.en: Like, I was touching your boob while I was touching her thigh, okay?
translation.it: Ti stavo toccando una tetta mentre le toccavo una coscia.

translation.en: That's, technically, I'm--
I'm in an incestuous relationship right now, okay?
translation.it: Sono coinvolto in una relazione incestuosa.

translation.en: Don't judge us.
I'm not judging you, okay? It's just...
translation.it: Non vi sto giudicando. È solo che...

translation.en: It's a surprise, and in all fairness...
you two should've told me.
Okay, dude. You know what? Sorry that we tried to fuck you.
translation.it: Ok. Sai una cosa? Scusa se abbiamo cercato di scoparti.

translation.en: No. I... I didn't mean it-- Uh, it's just...
I mean, maybe, like, one of you stays?
translation.it: Magari una di voi potrebbe restare.

translation.en: Go fuck yourself.
All right.
That'll be $2.35.
Shit. Fuck, dude, I don't have my wallet.
Can I pay you back later?
No, we don't do that.
Dude, I live, like, two blocks from here.
I'll run home, get money, come back, pay you.
translation.it: Corro a casa, prendo i soldi e torno.

translation.en: I'll pay you more than I owe you. I'll give you a big tip.
translation.it: Ti do più del dovuto e anche una bella mancia.

translation.en: No. You just go home, get your money,
translation.it: No, vai a casa, prendi i soldi,

translation.en: then come back and get your coffee.
translation.it: poi torni e ti do il caffè.

translation.en: Dude, I fucking need this coffee right now, please, dude.
translation.it: Ho bisogno del caffè ora, ti prego.

translation.en: I need it to, like, you know, get shit going.
translation.it: Ho bisogno di iniziare la giornata.

translation.en: Please, please, do me a solid.
This isn't a charity.
If you not gonna pay it, just go. Get out.
translation.it: Se non lo paghi, vattene. Esci.

translation.en: [stutters] What, you're just gonna let that coffee get cold?
You're just gonna waste that cup of coffee?
-Yeah. -That doesn't make any sense.
No, I'm fucking taking this coffee right now.
translation.it: No, ora prendo questo cazzo di caffè.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, you stealing the coffee.
I'm calling the police. You're on the cameras.
translation.it: Chiamo la polizia. Ci sono le telecamere.

translation.en: -I'm on the cameras? Big fucking deal. -Yeah, yeah. It's--
Hi, hello. Fuck you. Fuck you. I don't care, you have me on the camera.
translation.it: Salve. 'Fanculo. Non m'importa se sono sul video.

translation.en: You know me, dude. I'm good for it. I'll come right back.
translation.it: Mi conosci. Sono brava. Torno subito.

translation.en: Hey, you know what? I got this. It's cool.
translation.it: Ehi, sai che c'è? Ci penso io. A posto.

translation.en: [cashier] Are you sure?
Yeah. Yeah, I'm sure.
And a pack of cigarettes?
And a pack of smokes.
